author: jbellis
msg: Use Avro objects as input to CFOutputFormat.  patch by Stu Hood; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-1315

author: veithen
msg: Merged r816812 to the 1.5 branch. This change makes sure that the classpath used by the tests is similar to what a user would get and therefore helps ensuring the quality of the distribution.

author: pderop
msg: Once a component is started, make sure that all named dependencies are not in "instance bound" mode anymore, because we would like the component to be destroyed if a named dependency is not available anymore
